Amazing game to grow up with.

Wait? You mean to tell me you've never played Portal 2!? WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU!? The part 2 to the classic Portal, has loads more puzzles, an amazing 2 player map set, and a player made maps. Plus the world-building and story add to the original very well. Highly recommend. Grab a dual portal device and get in here! Mass lunacy awaits!

This is game is a well-rounded and fantastic sequel to it's predecessor, which I believe to be a great game as well. The comical and intriguing dialogue is a treat and the atmosphere adds to it. The atmosphere is very well blended with puzzles that are quite rewarding to figure out. I do suggest playing the first game before the second, for the story, but you don't have too.

It's really good with the puzzles, and the mechanics. Over all its really good to play and the story was the best I've played. The only thing about it that I don't like is the curing, but that's in Story Mode (Single Player). Other than that please buy and download this game it's awesome

Whether you're a Portal one veteran, a caveman, or a younger person without knowledge of The Portal Games, you should play this game. I hope my tears woven in to words will... make you wet and warm?

If your main reason for hating puzzle games is that you have to guess what the developers where thinking, you have to play this game. The developers were thinking about every possible way to make the puzzles perfect. When you get stuck, you always know what to do. The knowledge how to do it is just barely out of your reach. You're given one thing to advance, then different ways to use that one thing. Then a second thing, different ways, then you combine the first and second. Then different ways to combine them, and a third thing etc. The Combine becomes a very essential thing in this Valve game too...

Waited nine years to play this game, because I was afraid. Now that I finished it, the fear became reality. It's over. I can never play through it again, not for the first time. The Cake has been eaten. The fat jokes have been heard, and the fat lady has shot her final portal (oops, there was one more left).

The light at the end of the test chambers is, that I played the first Portal again before I started playing this, and it stilled made me laugh. It even might have felt better than the first time. Can't be sure since it's been... awhile. But I'll definitely come back to this one in a decade.

Feeling sad now that it's over. I am glad that it was as good as, and even exceeded my expectations.

I am GlaD...
Please invite your friends and family to the nearest testing facility immediately.
Just don't shoot the portals above and below you...

よくある質問。

Q1.ワイ頭悪いし、こういうゲーム疲れそうだし、ちょっとなあ。
A.中盤あたりから脊髄で物を考えられるようになるので全然おｋ。
Q2.レーザー当てた時の作動音やキャラのオートチューンボイスが頭から離れない？
A.頭離せばおｋ。
Q3.ワイ3D酔いするし、しかもパズルでアクションて・・・。
A.三半規管取れ。関係ない。あく買え。あくやれ。とにかくやれ。
